title: Type ID: Rounded Sans Serif
content:
Wondering if anyone could give me the name of this font. Also, any recommendations for similar rounded sans-serifs? Maybe one that isn't condensed.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220004729im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rounded_Sans_ID_4795.jpg)
author: ssuiter

comments.content: Similar rounded sans-serifs: Lineto Brauer Neue, Linotype DIN Next Rounded, FF Unit Rounded
